ChangeList.Description: Added the **exchange** relationship to the [roleManagement](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/roleManagement?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.

Added the `RoleManagement.Read.Exchange` delegated permission to the [GET](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/unifiedroledefinition-get?view=graph-rest-beta) and [LIST](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/rbacapplication-list-roledefinitions?view=graph-rest-beta) operations of the [unifiedRoleDefinition](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/unifiedRoleDefinition?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.

Added the `RoleManagement.Read.Exchange` delegated permission to the [GET](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/unifiedroleassignment-get?view=graph-rest-beta) and [LIST](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/rbacapplication-list-roleassignments?view=graph-rest-beta) operations of the [unifiedRoleAssignment](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/unifiedroleassignment?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.

Added the `RoleManagement.ReadWrite.Exchange` delegated permission to the [GET](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/unifiedroleassignment-get?view=graph-rest-beta), [POST](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/rbacapplication-post-roleassignments?view=graph-rest-beta), and [DELETE](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/unifiedroleassignment-delete?view=graph-rest-beta) operations of the [unifiedRoleAssignment](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/unifiedroleassignment?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.

Added the `RoleManagement.ReadWrite.Exchange` delegated permission to the [GET](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/unifiedroledefinition-get?view=graph-rest-beta) and [LIST](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/rbacapplication-list-roledefinitions?view=graph-rest-beta) operations of the [unifiedRoleDefinition](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/unifiedRoleDefinition?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
